detailsandmodality: Details and modalities for the 2024-2025 academic year
admissionprocess: Admission to the Faculty of Sciences is through application screening. Candidates are ranked based on their baccalaureate grades, taking into account their stream and honors.
step1: Preparation and submission of application file
step2: Ranking of candidates by merit based on baccalaureate grades
step3: Publication of results and list of admitted candidates
importantnote: Incomplete applications or those submitted after the deadline will not be processed. Registration fees are non-refundable.
documentsnote: All documents must be certified true copies
document2: Proof of payment of registration fee (50 000 Ar)

postmarkproof: Postmark serves as proof for postal submissions
ensuredocuments: Make sure you have all required documents before submitting your application.
intDescription: This page is dedicated to applicants wishing to join the Innovation and Technology (INT) track of the Master's in Computer Science and Technology (MIT). You will find admission requirements, selection procedures and the link to the online application form.
intMaster1Description: Students holding a Bachelor's degree in mathematics, computer science or related fields and a scientific baccalaureate (S or C series).
intMaster2Description: Students holding a Master 1 in mathematics or computer science or related fields and a scientific baccalaureate (S or C series).
intAdmissionProcessDescription: Admission to the Innovation and Technology (INT) track of the Computer Science and Technology (MIT) program is based on file selection and an interview. Candidates are evaluated based on their grades from the last three years of study, their baccalaureate results, and their interview performance.
intApplicationSubmissionDescription: Application files must be submitted exclusively online via the form available on the website.
intStep2: Pre-selection based on files: ranking of applications and selection of candidates invited for interview
intStep3: Publication of the list of candidates selected for interview
intStep5: Publication of the final list of admitted candidates
intDocument2: Transcripts of the last three years of study (bachelor's or equivalent)
intDocument4: Proof of payment of application fee (50,000 Ar)
intEnsureDocuments: Access the online form to submit your application file

errors.l3NotAllowedForM2: For Master 2, Bachelor 3 is not allowed
